hero.title: Crafting Digital Success from Scratch
hero.subtitle: Tailored Website Solutions for Every Company's Unique Vision

userPage.title: Ahrokhimpromtsentr
userPage.firstDescription: The corporate website seamlessly integrates user-friendly navigation with visually engaging design, providing visitors with an immersive experience.
userPage.secondDescription: Development process prioritized responsiveness and compatibility across devices, ensuring accessibility for a diverse audience.

adminPage.title: Admin page
adminPage.firstDescription: This special platform has been carefully designed to manage a corporate site, from product presentation to employment management.
adminPage.secondDescription: Security is a top priority, so we implemented robust authentication protocols to safeguard sensitive corporate information.

backend.title: Backend
backend.firstDescription: The backend project was meticulously developed to serve as the backbone of the application, handling data processing, logic, and ensuring functionality.
backend.secondDescription: Key features of the backend include a secure authentication system, robust data storage, and efficient API endpoints for communication with the frontend.

businessProcess.title: Business Process
businessProcess.subtitle: Empowering Your Business Growth with Cutting-Edge Solutions

slide01.title: Visualizing Your Goals
slide01.description: Imagine what you want your website to achieve and share your ideas with us.

slide02.title: Claiming Your Name
slide02.description: Pick a special web address (domain name) that's easy to remember.

slide03.title: Finding a Home Online
slide03.description: We'll set up a secure space for your website to live (hosting service).

slide04.title: Organizing Your Ideas
slide04.description: We'll work with you to plan what each part of your website will look like.

slide05.title: Creating the Look
slide05.description: Our designers will craft a beautiful design that matches your brand.

slide06.title: Making It Work
slide06.description: Our tech team will build the actual website based on the design.

slide07.title: Adding Your Touch
slide07.description: Share your content - words, pictures, and more - to make it truly yours.

slide08.title: Being Search-Friendly
slide08.description: We'll help your website show up when people search online (search engine optimization).

slide09.title: Checking Every Corner
slide09.description: We'll make sure everything works perfectly before we show it to the world.

slide10.title: Server Deployment
slide10.description: Once it's all set, we'll help your website go live.

slide11.title: Telling Everyone
slide11.description: Share your new website with friends, customers, and everyone you know.

slide12.title: Keeping it Fresh
slide12.description: We'll help you update your website over time and make sure it stays awesome.

benefits.title: Expert Development
benefits.subtitle: Crafting Interactive Realities
benefits.description: Experience websites that breathe life into your ideas with our expert development team.

benefits.title: Reliable Hosting
benefits.subtitle: Your Digital Home in Safe Hands
benefits.description: Count on seamless access and top-tier security with our hosting solutions.

benefits.title: Artistic Design
benefits.subtitle: Where Aesthetics Meet Functionality
benefits.description: Elevate user experience with visually captivating designs that resonate.

benefits.title: Thorough Testing
benefits.subtitle: Excellence in Every Click
benefits.description: We leave no stone unturned to ensure impeccable performance and functionality.
